titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal courthouse to be constructed in Greenville, South Carolina, as the "Carroll A. Campbell, Jr. Federal Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 447.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/27/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the Federal courthouse to be constructed in Greenville, South Carolina, building number SC0017ZZ, as the Carroll A. Campbell, Jr. Federal Courthouse.
